room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: Celebrated my husbands 40th!! Wicked fun. We love escape rooms- this location is at the top of our list now. Will watch for new games to come. Going back to do Hostage with our 2 kids soon. It was fun, challenging, and entertaining. Staff is knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful as well. THannah was an excellent guide Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: We did the Museum Heist. It was more fun than the other escape rooms we've done before! Highly recommended. They don't intrude in your experience and instead use cameras with mics to guide you.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: We had a blast here doing the Museum Heist. Staff were very friendly and courteous. The room was a very high quality puzzle. The props and set pieces were very high quality and felt very immersive. The puzzle was challenging but definitely solvable. Absolutely worth your time and the price.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: We decided to go here for my daughters b day, based on all the glowing reviews. We did escape the museum and had a wonderful time. We will be coming back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: We had a great time! We did the Museum Heist with a group of 8. The puzzles were challenging, but not impossible, and we had a few nudges from our game master who didn't give anything more than necessary.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: Went here for the first time recently with a small group of 13-year-olds as part of a birthday celebration. For our first escape room, we chose the Museum Heist and found it challenging but managed to break out with 2 minutes left. Our game master was awesome! The girls were totally into it and can't wait to go back and try another game.
